text: Vidalia onions are a variety of onions. They are native to Toombs County, Georgia. They are different from other onions because they are more sweet in taste. Southeast Georgia's mild climate, the area's sandy, low sulfur soil, exclusive seedvarieties, and precise farming practices make this original sweet onion, mild and flavorful. == Other websites == *Vidalia Onion Committee, the official website Category:Root vegetables Category:Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Vidalia onions
